text:
@realDonaldTrump Dear Mr. President
CoronaVirus were fruits from deadly seeds that were sowed—-mostly by Democratic Presidents since after WWII with their naive and perverted foreign policies to Chinese Communists. While Republican Presidents, Eisenhower, Reagan and Trump’s FP to CCP were perfect
